channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I am scared to death that I’ll run out of money’: My wife and I are in our 50s and have $4.4 million. Can we retire early?
item.description: “How can I get it through my head that we are good and that I can retire?”

item.title: I’m 65 and a widow with 5 children. Should I split my $1.1 million nest egg between them while I’m still alive?
item.description: “I receive part of my late husband’s government annuity, which is enough for me to live off.”

item.title: ‘We live modestly’: My wife and I have $900K in stocks and $380K in savings and CDs. Do we have too much cash?
item.description: “My investment adviser says we have too much invested in cash instruments.”

item.title: Why going to Disney’s Abu Dhabi theme park may actually be cheaper than visiting Disney World in Orlando
item.description: Disney’s parks outside the U.S. are often a bargain compared with its American ones.

item.title: Imagination unveils E-Series GPUs for graphics and AI at the edge
item.description: Imagination Technologies is unveiling its E-Series graphics processing units (GPUs) for graphics and AI processing at the edge.

item.title: U.S. productivity, economy’s secret sauce, falls for first time in almost 3 years
item.description: Swings in output and employment resulting from the tariff war will make it hard to gauge productivity, economists said.

item.title: Nvidia welcomes Trump’s proposal to rescind global chip restrictions

item.title: Netflix unveils new TV experience with GenAI search and AI-based recommendations
item.description: Netflix unveiled its new TV experience that features generative AI search, AI-based recommendations and an enhanced design.

item.title: Amazon’s Vulcan robot uses force sensing to stow items
item.description: Amazon's Vulcan robot uses touch and AI to pick and stow 75% of warehouse items. Amazon previewed Vulcan during a keynote at Robotics Summit & Expo 20...

item.title: Mistral comes out swinging for enterprise AI customers with new Le Chat Enterprise, Medium 3 model
item.description: Mistral AI is making a concerted push to lower the barriers to scalable, privacy-respecting AI adoption for modern enterprises.
